text: Patriarch Cyril II may refer to: * Pope Cyril II of Alexandria, Pope of Alexandria & Patriarch of the See of St. Mark in 1078–1092 * Patriarch Cyril II of Alexandria, Greek Patriarch of Alexandria in the 12th century * Cyril II of Constantinople, Ecumenical Patriarch of Constantinople in 1633, 1635–1636 and 1638–1639 * Patriarch Cyril II of Jerusalem (ruled in 1846–1872)
title: Patriarch Cyril II
